name: Oddity (itch) (DEVKARA)
description:
A teenager experiences a very strange incident at home. Mystical things that do not make sense, if in a very long time then the stakes are lives.

Looking for an object that moves or changes very strangely, and fix it before time runs out.

Can you survive the allotted time?
